overview: Lionel Hampton, a fantastic bandleader, energetic performer and well loved all over the world, features in this collection of rare performances from the 40s and 50s. Also featured is material from the fabulous Lionel Hampton big band, whose first vibraphonist in jazz career skyrocketed since his debut recording in 1929. 1. Midnight Sun 2. Beulahs Boogie 3. Love You Like Mad, Love You Like Crazy 4. Ding Dong Baby 5. Cobbs Idea 6. Vibe Boogie 7. T.V Special 8. Bongo Interlude 9. Air Mail Special 10. Slide, Hamp, Slide
title: LEGENDS in CONCERT: LIONEL HAMPTON
